text: Danilo Petrović and Tak Khunn Wang were the defending champions but chose not to defend their title. Gero Kretschmer and Alexander Satschko won the title after defeating Andreas Mies and Oscar Otte 2–6, 7–6(8–6), [10–3] in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw ZS-Sports China International Challenger - Doubles Category:2017 in Chinese sport
title: 2017 ZS-Sports China International Challenger – Doubles
